noun.description: A disk or circle of light shown surrounding or above the head of a saint or holy person to represent their holiness.
A circle of white or colored light around the sun, moon, or other luminous body caused by refraction through ice crystals in the atmosphere.

verb.description: Surround with or as if with a halo.

origin: Mid 16th century (denoting a circle of light round the sun etc.): from medieval Latin, from Latin halos, from Greek halōs disk of the sun or moon.
